ygData.subject: Gaming Website/Messageboard
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone in this mailing list. I created a new website+messageboard specially for Singapore Gamers. Hope everyone can at least take a look when Ur free. It
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone in this mailing list. I created a new website+messageboard
specially for Singapore Gamers. Hope everyone can at least take a look when
Ur free. It looks horrible now as I just started it but hopefully in weeks
to come it'll improve. Please visit the messageboard as its what my website
is focused on.
Lastly, when U guys are free forward the URL of the website to ur friends :p
Thanks alot!

The URL are http://home4.pacific.net.sg/~dexterwong/index.html
and http://www.gamezonesg.cjb.net
The 1st is the real URL and the 2nd is a URL redirector. Much easier to
remember.
